task.summary: Default task
Initial (and very rough) Alarm manager impl
fix extras data
keep DAO stuff free of scheduler/non-dao stuff
move away from AsyncTask with poller to ProgressDialog<-->Service impl
first draft of service-back-to-activity logic impl, rename of ProbeRunnerService as there's going to be two different services for running probes.
It's easy to get async stuff working in android, but to get it to work in every use case (screen rotation etc) is a pain
move away from return intents, doing everything including finished-runner handling with broadcast intents only

Moved run state into separate object - Service writes to it, activity reads from it on broadcast from service. Better handling of cancellation. State stored in Application, keyed by 'probeRunId' to prevent older broadcasts from colliding.
Okay, I think I'm going to use this solution for the probe runner. Some cleanup wrt 'cancelling' a task (although it won't be instantly cancelled).
addition of probeId to proberuninfo, also a bit of reorg
add in http probe test
Move stuff out into meaningful packages
start work on actual probe runner impls
add ping probe runner impl
need to store probe-type specific somewhere during runtime, decided to just subclass probe with extra vars in each type. Means no need anymore for ProbeType which is now gone (affects loads of stuff)
url out
Detail pages for three probe types fleshed out
Saving and loading of ping probes, as well as basic running implemented!
All three probes should have a working implementation by now
test using runners in scheduler service
np check
notification sound pref test
added probe selection/creation dialogs for 'new schedule' button
wrong activity called on probe-for-schedule selection
quick and dirty population of foreign key probe_fk as a Probe object, and reworking of the schedule list adapter query to include the probe name.
fix problem with error messages on ICS light theme
empty list buttons added
crude deletion of dependent schedules on probe deletion
Removed 'InteractiveProbeRunInfo' and replaced with db-persisted ProbeRun, lots of cleanup on the way
add basic probe run history view
work on showing log in dialog window
popup run dialog on history entry selection
name fix, populate fields on run history
Take 'running' logic out of services
asynctask was overkill
record old threads as 'canceled' in the db if they get replaced by new runs
delete history on delete
start doing notifications properly
fixup starting log view from notification. Also handle no net connection available during run.
initial history clearing work, some extra UI controls
New component 'PinglyProbeDetails' for header of any specific probe-related view
button in new component made everything confusing/cluttered - Removed the button, made the whole header itself clickable
bgcolor a bit garish
prune on save
add missing impls for probes
save and run
minor validation fixes
